sources.description: Attack by monsters from another planet! IMDB page

sources.title: Killers from Space
sources.description: A scientist monitoring atomic tests, killed in a plane crash, is revived by aliens so he can spy on the tests and help them conquer the world. - IMDB Description

sources.title: Killers From Space
sources.description: This is a surreal little movie by Billy Wilder's much-less talented older brother, W. Lee Wilder. It was originally released in a 1:85 aspect ratio. This is an attempt to recreate the original aspect ratio using the best public domain print I could find. The 16mm print seemed to be already slightly cropped and a true 1:85 ratio looked too cramped. This version has been blown-up and cropped at about 1:75, not the correct ratio, but much closer to the intended composition. Killers from Space Killers from Space  is a  1954  American  black and white   science fiction   feature   film , produced and directed by  W. Lee Wilder (brother of  Billy Wilder ) from an original, commissioned screenplay by his son  Myles Wilder  and their regular collaborator William Raynor, and starring  Peter Graves  and  Barbara Bestar . Lee Wilder's independent production company,  Planet Filmplays Inc. , usually producing on a financing-for-distribution basis for  United Artists , made this film for  RKO Radio Pictures  distribution.W. Lee Wilder Killers from Space From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia Killers from Space Directed by W. Lee Wilder Produced by W. Lee Wilder Written by William Raynor Myles Wilder Narrated by Mark Scott Starring Peter Graves Barbara Bestar James Seay William Gerstle Music by Manuel Compinsky Cinematography William H. Clothier Editing by William Faris Distributed by RKO Radio Pictures Release dates January 23, 1954, re-released 1956 Language English Killers from Space  is a  1954  American  black and white   science fiction   feature   film , produced and directed by  W. Lee Wilder (brother of  Billy Wilder ) from an original, commissioned screenplay by his son  Myles Wilder  and their regular collaborator William Raynor, and starring  Peter Graves  and  Barbara Bestar . Lee Wilder's independent production company,  Planet Filmplays Inc. , usually producing on a financing-for-distribution basis for  United Artists , made this film for  RKO Radio Pictures  distribution.

sources.title: Killers from Space
sources.description: From IMDb : Atomic scientist Doug Martin is missing after his plane crashes on a reconnaissance mission after a nuclear test. Miraculously appearing unhurt at the base later, he is given sodium amytal to reveal what happened, but authorities are skeptical of his story that he was captured by aliens determined to conquer the Earth with giant monsters and insects. Martin vows to use existing technology to destroy them. Stars: Peter Graves with an uncredited appearance by Coleman Francis! This copy of the movie has the original green tinting used in many scenes, which is missing from other copies ( here , here and here ) at IA.

sources.title: Manhunt in Space  (1954) ROCKY JONES, SPACE RANGER
sources.description:
Stars: Richard Crane, Scotty Beckett, Sally Mansfield
Director: Hollingsworth Morse

You've heard of The Lone Ranger, now meet The Space Ranger! Follow the adventures of Rocky Jones and crew as they cruise the galaxy in their Orbit Jet X-V2 and defend Earth against space-bound evil doers!

sources.title: Killers from Space (1954) PETER GRAVES
sources.description:
Stars: Peter Graves, James Seay, Steve Pendleton
 Director: W. Lee Wilder

 A scientist monitoring atomic tests, killed in a plane crash, is revived by aliens so he can spy on the tests and help them conquer the world.

sources.title: Killers From Space (1954) Classic Horror, Sci-Fi Movie | starring Peter Graves
sources.description:
Strange creatures from another world attack planet earth!
An atomic scientist claims he was abducted by aliens after being injured in a plane crash.

Director: W. Lee Wilder
Writer: William Raynor, Myles Wilder 
Stars: Peter Graves, James Seay, Steve Pendleton 
Genre: Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi

Original titles: Killers From Space (1954)
Alternative titles: Guerra tra i pianeti, Asesinos del espacio, Les Tueurs de l'espace, 魔星袭地球, Mundos Que Se Chocam

00:00 Full Movie (with dubbed audio & subtitles)
00:03 Military atomic bomb test goes awry, leading to a tragic plane crash and loss of life.
07:23 Mysterious events unfold after a plane crash involving Dr. Martin, raising suspicions of identity and memory loss.
12:44 A doctor struggles with being excluded from a project and faces consequences for his actions.
23:26 Mysterious disappearance of Dr. Martin leads to FBI investigation and suspicions of foul play.
33:01 Encounter with alien beings leads to memory retrieval and revelation of intergalactic travel.
37:27 Extraterrestrial beings plan to invade Earth using genetically modified creatures after their sun dies.
50:48 Alien invasion plot uncovered by brainwashed scientist, leading to potential nuclear disaster and need for decisive action.
55:13 A doctor investigates strange occurrences and a patient's claims of monsters created by nuclear force.
1:01:54 A scientist plans to cause a massive explosion by cutting off power to a large area.


@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Atomic scientist/pilot Doug Martin is missing after his plane crashes on an reconnaissance mission after a nuclear test. Miraculously appearing unhurt at the base later, he is given sodium amethol, but authorities are skeptical of his story that he was captured by aliens determined to conquer the Earth with giant monsters and insects. Martin vows to use existing technology to destroy them.
metadata.Actors: Peter Graves, James Seay, Steve Pendleton
